title: Synthesis of multi-layer graphene oxide from HCl-treated coke and Brazilian coals by sulfuric acid thermal exfoliation and ozone oxidation
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Sergio Nicolas Buitrago Sanchez, Julia da Silveira Salla, Laura Piacentini Cesconeto, Gabriel Lincoln da Rocha, Elaine Virmond, Regina de Fatima Peralta Muniz Moreira
